body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i am not sorry .

Not only am I inebriated by 1 and a half bottles of Fireball but, in my infinite knowledge, I decide to peruse my library and get absolutely emotionally demolished by this motherfucker. I don't recommend learning japanese. Not only are you wasting at least 3 years of your life, you and I know why you'd have the incentive to do so. It's not worth it.
